verbose_text: As well as in the case of vitamin B 12, metformin may also cause folate deficiency; a double blind randomized clinical trial of 8-week supplementation with folic acid of diabetic men on metformin, showed an improvement in homocysteine levels, total antioxidant capacity and malondialdehyde [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: metformin may also cause folate deficiency; a double blind randomized clinical trial of 8-week supplementation with folic acid
